text: Ulrika Åkerberg (born July 4, 1941 in Enköping) is a Swedish curler.Landslagsspelare genom tiderna – Damer – Svenska Curlingförbundet (Swedish female national curlers; look at "Åkerberg, Ulrika") Also known as Ulrika Åkerberg-Palm. She is a .
